statements: SELECT * FROM injury_tracking;
SELECT injury_type, recovery_status FROM injury_tracking WHERE recovery_status IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM injury_tracking WHERE therapy_sessions > 10;
SELECT * FROM injury_tracking WHERE injury_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY injury_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_injuries FROM injury_tracking;
SELECT * FROM injury_tracking WHERE recovery_status IS NOT NULL ORDER BY injury_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT injury_id, injury_type, recovery_status FROM injury_tracking WHERE therapy_sessions >= 5 ORDER BY injury_date ASC
SELECT * FROM injury_tracking WHERE recovery_status IS NULL AND injury_date <= '2022-01-31'
SELECT DISTINCT injury_type FROM injury_tracking WHERE recovery_status = 'In Progress'
SELECT SUM(therapy_sessions) AS total_therapy_sessions FROM injury_tracking
SELECT id, patient_id, injury_type, injury_date, recovery_status FROM injury_history;
SELECT patient_id, injury_type, injury_date FROM injury_history WHERE recovery_status = TRUE;
SELECT patient_id, therapist_id, session_date, therapy_notes FROM physical_therapy_sessions;
SELECT therapist_id, session_date, therapy_notes FROM physical_therapy_sessions WHERE patient_id = '57e4af6e-7574-4f79-8322-0b53e4bf9d40';
SELECT session_id, patient_id, therapist_id FROM physical_therapy_sessions ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM injury_history WHERE injury_type = 'Fracture';
SELECT id, patient_id FROM injury_history WHERE recovery_status = true ORDER BY injury_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM physical_therapy_sessions WHERE therapist_id = '12345' AND session_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY session_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sessions, patient_id FROM physical_therapy_sessions GROUP BY patient_id HAVING total_sessions > 5;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS total_sessions FROM physical_therapy_sessions GROUP BY patient_id ORDER BY total_sessions DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM injury_history;
SELECT recovery_status, injury_type FROM injury_history ORDER BY injury_date DESC;
SELECT injury_id, injury_type, recovery_status FROM injury_history WHERE recovery_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT * FROM recovery_progress WHERE recovery_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT therapist_name, exercises_completed FROM physical_therapy_sessions WHERE session_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY session_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM injury_history WHERE recovery_status='In Progress';
SELECT injury_type, injury_date, recovery_status FROM injury_history WHERE recovery_status='Completed';
SELECT * FROM recovery_progress ORDER BY recovery_date DESC;
SELECT session_id, therapist_name, exercises_completed FROM physical_therapy_sessions WHERE therapist_name='John Doe' AND exercises_completed LIKE '%stretch%';

SELECT ih.injury_type, rs.recovery_date, ps.therapist_name FROM injury_history ih JOIN recovery_progress rs ON ih.injury_id = rs.injury_id JOIN physical_therapy_sessions ps ON ih.injury_id = ps.injury_id WHERE rs.recovery_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY rs.recovery_date ASC, ps.therapist_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM injury_history;
SELECT patient_id, injury_type, injury_date FROM injury_history;
SELECT recovery_status, recovery_date, recovery_notes FROM recovery_progress;
SELECT activity_name, activity_type, activity_duration FROM injury_prevention;
SELECT patient_id, therapist_id, session_date, session_duration FROM physical_therapy_sessions;
SELECT * FROM injury_history ORDER BY injury_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_id, injury_type, injury_date FROM injury_history WHERE patient_id = 10 AND injury_type = 'Fracture' ORDER BY injury_date ASC;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(id) AS total_injuries FROM injury_history GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(id) > 1;
SELECT ip.patient_id, ip.activity_name, pts.therapist_id, pts.session_date FROM injury_prevention AS ip JOIN physical_therapy_sessions AS pts ON ip.patient_id = pts.patient_id;

SELECT rh.id, rp.recovery_status, rh.injury_description, ips.activity_name FROM injury_history AS rh LEFT JOIN recovery_progress AS rp ON rh.patient_id = rp.patient_id LEFT JOIN injury_prevention AS ips ON rh.patient_id = ips.patient_id WHERE rp.recovery_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT * FROM injury_history;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, phone_number FROM patients;
SELECT therapist_name, years_of_experience, clinic_location FROM therapists WHERE years_of_experience > 5;
SELECT progress_date, recovery_percentage FROM recovery_progress ORDER BY progress_date DESC;
SELECT session_date, therapist_notes FROM physical_therapy_sessions WHERE session_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender='F';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, email FROM patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT therapist_name, clinic_location FROM therapists WHERE years_of_experience > 5 ORDER BY years_of_experience DESC;
SELECT th.therapist_name, th.years_of_experience, pt.therapy_type FROM therapists th INNER JOIN physical_therapy_sessions pt ON th.therapist_id = pt.therapist_id WHERE pt.session_date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT ih.injury_type, rp.recovery_percentage, ps.exercises_completed FROM injury_history ih INNER JOIN recovery_progress rp ON ih.injury_id = rp.injury_id INNER JOIN physical_therapy_sessions ps ON rp.progress_id = ps.progress_id WHERE ih.recovery_status = 'In Progress';
